Issue.creator: chris.elder
Issue.summary: CouchDB - documents deleted in multiple batches cause an error
Issue.description: CouchDB will throw an error if a document is deleted in more than one update batch. The first batch actually deletes the document, but if the delete is included in a subsequent batch an exception will be thrown since the document revision will not be resolved correctly. In this case, the batch update should ignore documents that are already deleted. Update documents are not impacted since the update operation can correctly resolve the CouchDB revision info.
